item.description: [[My Calendar/My Weekly Notes/<% moment(tp.file.title, “YYYY-[W]WW”).add(-1, ‘weeks’).format(“YYYY-[W]WW”) %>|<% moment(tp.file.title, “YYYY-[W]WW”).add(-1, ‘weeks’).format(“YYYY-[W]WW”) %>]] ‚¨ÖÔ∏è [[My Calendar/My Monthly Notes/<% moment(tp.file.title,‘YYYY-[W]WW’).format(‘YYYY-[M]MM’) %>|<% moment(tp.file.title,‘YYYY-[W]WW’).format(‘YYYY-[M]MM’) %>]] ‚û°Ô∏è [[My Calendar/My Weekly Notes/<% moment(tp.file.title, “YYYY-[W]WW”).add(1, ‘weeks’).format(“YYYY-[W]WW”) %>|<% moment(tp.file.title, “YYYY-[W]WW”).add(1, ‘weeks’).format(“YYYY-[W]WW”) %>]] [!TIP]+ Follow my weekly review workflow Visit https://publish.obsidian.md/johnmavrick/My+weekly+review+workflow for a guide on how to use this template Plan Link to heading Action Items Link to heading All the unfinished tasks/reminders from last review: task where file.name = "<% moment(tp.

[[My Calendar/My Weekly Notes/2024-W16|2024-W16]] ‚¨ÖÔ∏è [[My Calendar/My Monthly Notes/2024-M04|2024-M04]] ‚û°Ô∏è [[My Calendar/My Weekly Notes/2024-W18|2024-W18]] [!TIP]+ Follow my weekly review workflow Visit https://publish.obsidian.md/johnmavrick/My+weekly+review+workflow for a guide on how to use this template Plan Link to heading Action Items Link to heading All the unfinished tasks/reminders from last review: task where file.name = "2024-W16" AND !completed Projects Link to heading Look at My Vision Board to remember what your vision is #hidden Visit My Projects note and update the status of your desired projects in Backlog üü• or Upcoming üüß to In Progress üü® #hidden For each project you want to work on this week, go to the project’s ## Weekly Progress header and create a new weekly progress for the same week number as this weekly note.
